notes.summary: PR #46 stabilization + QIR --ops hardening; memory activation
notes.ci_status: preflight green; workflows unified; pgTAP fixed (functions-only apply)
highlights: CLI --ops: emit views only when paramless; always emit functions
OpPlanBuilder: normalize filters/orderBy; strict validation; lateral lists via LEFT JOIN LATERAL + jsonb_agg
Lowering: minimal quoting for reserved/unsafe idents; Emission: reserved param guard
Workflows: ecommerce.graphql; create wes_ops; install extensions; apply *.fn.sql; EXPLAIN strict; pgTAP installed in container
Pinned pnpm 9.15.9 in boundaries; action-setup@v4 elsewhere; preflight ESLint via pnpm dlx v9

notes.summary: Addressed PR #45/#46 feedback; unblocked pnpm action; added experimental --ops wiring and examples.

topics.what: Updated docs to surface emitView() SQL and clarified reserved keyword limitation explicitly (will error).
topics.why: Example previously dropped returned SQL and wording implied protection we don’t enforce.

topics.what: Added permissions (contents:read) to docs-link-check/preflight; fixed branches list; removed pnpm version pins across workflows to avoid ERR_PNPM_BAD_PM_VERSION; improved preflight to use repo ESLint via flat-config temp file and dynamic license audit via pnpm ls; documented link-check regex limitations and ignoreDirs rationale; tightened fs error handling.
topics.why: Resolve CI failures and align tooling with repo ESLint version; improve maintainability.

topics.what: Exposed @wesley/core/domain/qir via package exports; added OpPlanBuilder (JSON DSL → QIR plan); wired CLI generate to compile *.op.json under --ops into view/function SQL; added examples (example/ops/products_by_name.op.json, orders_by_user.op.json).
topics.why: Deliver Phase C initial wiring without changing default CLI behavior.

ci_effects: Preflight and Docs Link Check pass locally
Removed pnpm action version pins to resolve setup error
next_steps: Add EXPLAIN (FORMAT JSON) snapshots for ops
Add pgTAP smoke tests for emitted ops
Consider removing the early --ops no-op log to reduce noise
Extend builder for joins + nested lists (LATERAL + jsonb_agg)

notes.summary: Consolidated public readiness (single checklist), added preflight + CI guards, advanced QIR docs, and standardized licensing to MIND-UCAL.

topics.what: Updated QIR guide and clarified lowering identifier quoting; maintained emission helpers and tests
topics.why: Align documentation with merged QIR lowering/emission and resolve PR #45 feedback
topics.context: QIR lowering (PR #42) and emission (PR #44) are merged; docs in #45
topics.issue: Docs phrasing around identifier quoting was ambiguous
topics.resolution: Reworded constraints and added Postgres reserved keyword reference; pushed to PR #45
topics.future_work: Wire --ops in CLI with op→QIR translator and examples

topics.what: Added preflight script (docs links, dep-cruise, ESLint purity, workflows/.gitignore, license audit), pre-push hook, and CI job
topics.why: Prevent regressions and keep repo cost-conscious and healthy
topics.resolution: Created scripts, hooks, and workflows; pnpm-only enforcement
topics.future_work: Optionally add caching for dlx tools to shave seconds

topics.what: Required checks configured on main (build-test, boundaries, quick CLI, Preflight, Docs Link Check)
topics.issue: Missing required checks and review enforcement
topics.resolution: Set required checks and review rules (admins enforced; linear history left off)
topics.future_work: Revisit linear history once merge strategy is finalized

topics.what: Removed dead workflows/docs; added missing internals/guides; added docs link-check workflow
topics.why: Eliminate broken links and reduce CI spend
topics.context: Old Claude workflows and dead links existed

issue.summary: Holmes workflow now emits markdown+JSON reports, reuses a shared setup action with cache-aware history hydration, and documentation was updated to describe the new artifacts.
highlights: Holmes CLI accepts --json to persist machine-readable investigation output
Workflow artifacts flattened to holmes.md/json, watson.md/json, moriarty.md/json
GitHub comment links to structured reports and handles missing artifacts gracefully
Documentation updated with CLI usage, CI sample, cache behaviour, and env overrides

issue.summary: HOLMES e2e coverage, report schemas, and dashboard artifact added.
highlights: Added HOLMES Bats e2e covering JSON/markdown artifacts
Runtime schemas validate reports in CLI and node tests
Workflow now uploads holmes-dashboard artifact for SCS/TCI/MRI visuals

issue.summary: Published MkDocs docs site and documented pnpm workspace layout for readiness.

topics.what: Created MkDocs configuration with quick-start pages and GitHub Pages workflow
topics.why: Go Public checklist required a minimal public docs presence
topics.context: The repo only had README-based instructions before opening
topics.issue: Users had no hosted documentation to browse without cloning
topics.resolution: Implemented MkDocs content and docs-site workflow in PR #157
topics.future_work: Monitor first gh-pages deployment and iterate on content

topics.what: Annotated pnpm workspace file to clarify included projects
topics.why: Sweep of Docs & Process backlog item #86
topics.context: Only packages/* were listed with no explanation
topics.issue: Contributors lacked guidance on workspace entries
topics.resolution: Added comments describing packages, example app, and docs sources in a dedicated PR
topics.future_work: Expand guidance once additional workspaces are added

key_decisions: Adopt MkDocs with gh-deploy for the minimal public docs site
Document pnpm workspace entries in place instead of a separate doc

action_items.task: Verify GitHub Pages is enabled for the repository after merge

issue.summary: Relocated postgres seed fixtures and cleaned remote branches while documenting remaining follow-ups.

topics.what: Moved docker-entrypoint init SQL into test/fixtures/postgres and refreshed docs
topics.why: Reduce root clutter and clarify fixture purpose
topics.issue: Init scripts looked like stray artifacts
topics.resolution: Renamed directory, updated docker-compose mounts, documented usage
topics.future_work: Verify docker compose still boots cleanly

topics.what: Deleted merged/stale origin branches and cataloged remaining ones
topics.why: Reduce cognitive load before next planning pass
topics.context: Many historical branches lingered on origin
topics.issue: Difficult to know which branches mattered
topics.resolution: Deleted safe branches, noted remaining with recommended actions
topics.future_work: Decide on strategy for ops/rehearse/holmes branches

topics.what: Ensured remote deletions respect repo rules and preflight hooks
topics.resolution: Deleted branches individually, confirming tests stayed green

key_decisions: Relocate docker seed scripts under test/fixtures/postgres
Document rationale for remaining long-lived branches

action_items.task: Evaluate remaining feature branches (ops discovery, rehearse, holmes weighting)
